CustomField.description: The path to the field node from the object key in the JSON Redox data model, stored as comma separated list (i.e. "Guarantor,Employer,Address" for Guarantor Employer Address). Use DEFAULT_VALUE to predefine a Salesforce field's default value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The path to the field node from the object key in the JSON Redox data model, stored as comma separated list (i.e. "Guarantor,Employer,Address" for Guarantor Employer Address). Use DEFAULT_VALUE to predefine a Salesforce field's default value.
CustomField.label: Redox Path
